section.title: What is OpenRPT?
section.para: OpenRPT is the open source SQL report writer and renderer from xTuple. OpenRPT is released under the GNU Lesser General Public License. And it is available in both standalone and embedded versions. It is the featured report writer in all editions of xTuple ERP. OpenRPT is available for download on the OpenRPT project page on SourceForge. You can also contact xTuple to learn more about commercial support options.

section.title: What Platforms Does OpenRPT Run On?
section.para: OpenRPT will operate effectively on the Linux, Mac OS X, and Windows platforms.
